==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 9===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**Characters on the field will continuously accumulate {{Color|Cryo|[[Sheer Cold]]}}, and will continually lose HP after {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}} reaches its limit.
**There will also be a [[Ruin Brazier]] on the field. While the Ruin Brazier is activated, getting close to it will reduce {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}}.
**Enemies will attack the Ruin Braziers, preventing them from diminishing the effects of {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}} in the area. Deactivated Ruin Braziers will restart after a while.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 1's Second Half, the Cryo Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an '''{{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}'''.
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, the Cryogunner Legionnaire is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
** In Chamber 3's Second Half, the Cryo Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.

===Floor 10===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**Characters on the field will continuously accumulate {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}}, and will continually lose HP after {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}} reaches its limit.
**[[Warming Seelie]] will appear on the field, and will continually alleviate nearby character's {{Color|Cryo|Sheer Cold}}.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 1's Second Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}. There is also a Cryo Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an '''{{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}'''.
** In Chamber 3's First Half, the Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
** In Chamber 3's Second Half, the Frostarm Lawachurl is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.

===Floor 11===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**Your character will be periodically be inflicted with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}, which continuously drains your [[Energy|Elemental Energy]] until the inflicted {{Electro}} is removed.
**{{Color|Cryo DMG}} dealt by all party members increased by 75%.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 1's First Half, the Hydro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Hydro}} aura that periodically spawns {{Color|Hydro|Mist Bubble}}.
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a '''{{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}'''.
** In Chamber 3's First Half, one of the Electrohammer Vanguards is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}, while the other is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.
